text: (ye taabeer sunate hee) baadashaah ne hukm diya ki yoosuph ko mere huzoor mein to le aao phir jab (shaahee) chaubadaar (ye hukm lekar) yoosuph ke paas aaya to yusooph ne kaha ki tum apanee sarakaar ke paas palat jao aur unase poochho ki (aap ko) kuchh un auraton ka haal bhee maaloom hai jinhone (mujhe dekh kar) apane apane haath kaat daale the ki ya main unaka taalib tha
